msContents.summary: Illuminated leaf with one complete ghazal and two partial poems. Includes the three last lines of ghazal beginning "saḥar bulbul ḥikāyat bā ṣabā kard", all of ghazal beginning "saman būyān ghubār-i gham chū binshīnand binshānand" and the first two lines of ghazal beginning "sāqī ḥadīs̲-i sarv va gul va lālah mīravad".

layoutDesc.layout: Written in twelve lines in two columns.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻlīq in black ink; pointed.

decoDesc.decoNote: Text on cloudbands with intercolumnar fill of polychrome flowers, the same fill between each poem; several sets of framing devices, from inner to outer: blue with gold leaf and vine motifs, pink with flower and stem motifs, a gold border-rule, gold, floral marginal fill, a gold frame-rule.

origin.p: The item is undated; possibly copied in the 18th century.
